Package gui

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.LoginController
  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller class for the login GUI. This class is responsible for handling user interactions and events in the login screen of the application. It provides methods for validating user input, performing login operations, and navigating to different screens based on the user type.
